attributes.action: To use Military action to help The people of Zimbabwe to remove Mugabe
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think it's high time that with the UN and Africa that Military action should be used to help Zimbabwean people, Mugabe has kicked us for being a power in the past so what!! We need to help the people of Zimbabwe!!

rejection.details: There are other similar petitions, see http://search.petitions.pm.gov.uk/kbroker/number10/petitions/search.lsim?qt=zimbabwe&sr=0&nh=10&cs=&sc=number10&oq=action+zimbabwe&sb=0&ha=1157&mt=0
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
